publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5035 Christine Grahame: Plugged in Safely?—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of a campaign by the Electrical Safety Council, the United Kingdom’s only charity dedicated to electrical safety, to increase awareness of the dangers of purchasing unsafe goods via the internet and, in particular, welcomes the charity’s independent safety testing that has established that 100% of chargers bought from a range of online auction sites and retailers would not pass current UK safety standards and could cause a real danger to Scottish consumers if simply plugged in as intended.
S3M-5035 Plugged in Safely? (lodged on 21 October 2009) Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*, Jim Tolson*, Brian Adam*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-5035 Plugged in Safely? (lodged on 21 October 2009) Gil Paterson*, Bill Wilson*, Bob Doris*
S3M-5035 Plugged in Safely? (lodged on 21 October 2009) Jackie Baillie*
S3M-5035 Plugged in Safely? (lodged on 21 October 2009) Dave Thompson*
